metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15733 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition 7.12 through 12.2.1. The specified default branch name could be exposed to unauthorized users.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects GitLab CE/EE 7.12 and later.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
